text: Niles Hollowell-Dhar (born October 6, 1988), better known by his stage name Kshmr (pronounced "Kashmir"; stylized as KSHМR), is an American-Indian DJ, record producer and musician from Berkeley, California. ==Extended plays== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !
